Subject: [shadowknight] New Survey

Hello,

There is a new survey for the shadowknight community.

Howabout an official and registerd pole?

1Handed or 2Handed Slashing?

Note: To vote, please click on URL, and do NOT reply to message, after a day
or two i will end pole and post results on list.



----

Possible answers are:

o 1 Handed Slashing
o 2 Handed Slashing


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/shadowknight


Thanks!

shadowknight Owner
